rooms.description: A grand entry with Art Deco detailing, welcoming space.
Spacious living area with a mix of modern and Art Deco finishes.
An open dining space integrated within the living room.
Functional kitchen with Art Deco motifs and efficient layout.
A compact, airy guest room that follows Vastu by placing it in the north-east corner.
Small quarters for domestic help, placed away from main living areas but easily accessible.

openings.description: Large entrance door with Art Deco detailing.

openings.location: East-facing windows in the living room and dining area for optimal morning light.
Adjacent to kitchen, facing west as per plot orientation.

additional_features.description: Art Deco styled terrace with decorative elements, providing a private outdoor space.

additional_features.location: Ground floor near the kitchen area for easy access while maintaining privacy.

vastu_considerations.description: West-facing plot, adjustments made to align main living spaces and entrance with favorable Vastu principles.
Guest bedroom placed in the north-east corner to invite positive energy.
